data.title: Become C Job Ready
data.content: C is one of the most efficient programming languages used in modern web browsers, operating systems, compilers, and many more. Learn to code in C Programming in the most interactive way possible, writing code and solving challenges in each step.

card1.title: Combine learning with practice
card1.desc: Not just another Python course. Solve 100+ challenges and create 5 projects in real-time.

card2.title: Step-by-step guide to Python
card2.desc: Start from the basics and become Python proficient in C by the end.

rock_paper.title: Rock, Paper & Scissors
rock_paper.desc: You will create a popular game rock paper scissors using the basic concepts of C programming like functions, control flow and input/output.
